title: Alt★Hero: Meet the Initiative
author: VD
content_html:
Episode 3: Meet the Initiative is now live on Webtoons. Don’t forget to subscribe! As with Chuck Dixon’s Avalon, it’s already making regular appearances in the Canvas Top 30 in the Superhero category.

We’re anticipating adding Tuesday and Thursday webtoons in May, with a brand new respin of what used to be called Hypergamouse on the former and Quantum Mortis appearing on the latter. The Legend is also developing an entirely new comic specifically for the online platform.
content_text:
Episode 3: Meet the Initiative
is now live on Webtoons. Don’t forget to subscribe! As with
Chuck Dixon’s Avalon
, it’s already making regular appearances in the Canvas Top 30 in the Superhero category.
We’re anticipating adding Tuesday and Thursday webtoons in May, with a brand new respin of what used to be called
Hypergamouse
on the former and
Quantum Mortis
appearing on the latter. The Legend is also developing an entirely new comic specifically for the online platform.
